version_description:
* Added a marker function to indicate the direction of the goal.
* Added clear time display in stage results.
* Added display of acquired skill icons during pause.
* Added ATK and LIFE status display in the equipment list.
* Changed equipment merge to only show mergeable equipment.
* Added support for displaying the life of area boss.
* The invincibility time after taking damage has been adjusted.
* Rod equipment has been adjusted.
* Fixed some bugs.

* Added mini-map
* Added automatic coin/item collection.
* Fixed the display of equipment parameters.
* Added the function to check drop items in cleared areas.
* Added the function to suspend/resume the explore.
* Adjustment of Enemies that fire bullets.
* Fixed spear attack bug, maybe.
* Fixed some bugs.
* The structure of the dungeon seems to have changed. Please be careful, explorers.
Added confirmation about tracking of ads.
